## typescriptCompileMiddleware() function

Creates instance of typescript compile middleware.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function typescriptCompileMiddleware(options?: ExpressTypescriptCompileOptions, logger?: Logger): Router;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [ExpressTypescriptCompileOptions](./express-typescript-compile.expresstypescriptcompileoptions.md) | options of middleware |
|  logger | Logger | logging target, default <code>console</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

Router
